ReactorEE.model

Class Plant

  • java.lang.Object
    • ReactorEE.model.Plant
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Plant
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Plant class is the holder of all plant components, the score, time steps passed, the name of the player, etc. It represents the "model" of the MVC model of the game.
    Author:
    Lamprey
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public Plant()
        This is the default constructor that is used when there is no saved game (i.e. new game)

      • getScore

        public int getScore()
        Returns:
        current score

      • calcScore

        public void calcScore()
        Updates the score. Calculates the score based on the power output of the generator and the number of time steps passed since the start of the game.

      • isPaused

        public boolean isPaused()
        Checks if the game is paused. Currently not used as the game is turn based. Makes creating a real time game easier.
        Returns:
        true if the game is paused

      • setPaused

        public void setPaused(boolean isPaused)
        Sets the paused state of the game. Currently not used as the game is turn based. Makes creating a real time game easier.
        Parameters:
        isPaused - whether to pause or resume the game

      • getMaxSteamFlowRate

        Returns:
